name: Chivalrous Chair
desc: The chair Kyrin made for the Chivalrous pirates. Sit on it to restore 50 HP every 10 secs.

name: "Blackbull's" deed to the land
desc: A lost deed to the land for "Blackbull" of Perion.

name: "Perfect" Sophilia Doll
desc: A doll that is a chilling likeness of Sophilia but looks odd and unnatural.

name: (-) Delete Automatic Pick-Up
desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items and mesos.

name: (-) Delete HP Charge
desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.

name: (-) Delete Item Pick-Up
desc: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items.

name: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso
desc: Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

name: (-)Delete Expand Range
desc: Use this scroll to return the range of pet's movement back to normal.

name: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills
desc: Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#

name: Diary : 10th Page
desc:
May 7th
Title : Restoring the Statue
Looking at the busted statue of goddess, Papa Pixie...
                     10 / 10 page

name: Diary : 1st Page
desc:
April 16th
Title : I have finally started writing a diary.
The Owl of Minerva today...
                      1 / 10 page

name: Diary : 2nd Page
desc:
April 19th
Title : My Statue
The humans have been building a tall tower for me...
                      2 / 10 page

name: Diary : 3rd Page
desc:
April 23rd
Title : On a Lazy Afternoon...
Lately, every morning I have been...
                      3 / 10 page

name: Diary : 4th Page
desc:
April 24th
Title : Unwelcome Guest
Today, Papa Pixie came by for a visit wearing this round, weird-looking hat...
                      4 / 10 page

name: Diary : 5th Page
desc:
April 27th
Title : Busted Statue of Goddess
Today was really a rough day...
                      5 / 10 page

name: Diary : 6th Page
desc:
April 28th
Title : Papa Pixie's 2nd Visit
Papa Pixie, who came by a couple of days ago...
                      6 / 10 page

name: Diary : 7th Page
desc:
April 30th
Title : A Visit by Human
Today, the humans paid a visit to the tower...
                      7 / 10 page

name: Diary : 8th Page
desc:
May 3rd
Title : Lazy Papa Pixie
Today I felt like watering the garden...
                      8 / 10 page

name: Diary : 9th Page
desc:
May 5th
Title : Eak's Lecture
Eak was following me around all day...
                      9 / 10 page

name: Maple Life (A-Type)
desc:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

name: Maple Life (B-Type)
desc:
#c*Warning : If all 12 character slots are full, it cannot be used.#

This package has the #cMaple Life item plus an Extra Character Slot coupon.#Using this item will automiatically create a new slot.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

desc: A mark carried by the Dragon Squad as the means of identification.
